content:

thought: To craft a writable book, I need to craft paper, then a book, and finally the writable book. Since I have 3 sugar cane, I can use them to craft paper. Therefore I will start by moving the sugar cane to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
